content: I don't have access to the latest information. however, i can provide some examples of companies that have invested in or set up operations in noida in the past. 1. samsung: samsung has set up its largest mobile manufacturing unit in noida with an investment of $700 million. 2. hcl technologies: hcl technologies has established its headquarters in noida, and it is one of the largest employers in the city. 3. accenture: accenture has established its technology innovation hub in noida, which focuses on research and development of emerging technologies. 4. barclays: barclays has set up its global service centre in noida, which provides support services to the bank's operations across the world. 5. jubilant foodworks: jubilant foodworks, the parent company of domino's pizza in india, has set up its largest facility in noida with an investment of rs 100 crore. these are just a few examples of the many companies that have invested in noida in recent years, and it shows the potential of the city as an attractive investment destination in india.
